ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.NAME: Name:
ABOUT.ABOUT_ME_CONTENT_1: I’m Iheb Mekni, a dedicated Full Stack Developer with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering. I specialize in building scalable, efficient applications using technologies like Angular and Spring Boot. My strengths include problem-solving, teamwork and communication, self-management, and time organization.
ABOUT.ABOUT_ME_CONTENT_2: I’m passionate about learning new technologies and continuously improving my skills to tackle new challenges and deliver impactful solutions.

WEB_DESIGN.DESCRIPTION: Crafting visually appealing and user-friendly designs that ensure an engaging user experience.

WEB_DEVELOPMENT.TITLE: Web Development
WEB_DEVELOPMENT.DESCRIPTION: Building robust and scalable web applications tailored to meet your business needs.

1.CARD_TITLE: Getting Started with Full Stack Java Development
1.DESCRIPTION: A beginner's guide to full stack Java development. Learn about the technologies involved, the basic architecture, and how to set up your development environment.

2.DESCRIPTION: Learn about Agile methodology and how it improves software development processes. Benefits of Agile and how to implement it in your projects.

3.CARD_TITLE: Building a RESTful API with Spring Boot
3.DESCRIPTION: Step-by-step guide on how to create a RESTful API using Spring Boot. Learn about the core concepts, best practices, and how to deploy your API.

4.CARD_TITLE: The Rise of AI: Transforming Industries
4.DESCRIPTION: Explore how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing various sectors, from healthcare to finance.  Learn about the latest advancements and future trends in AI technology.

1.DESCRIPTION: This website for a medical clinic, developed in PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, features two sessions: admin and patient. Administrators can manage users, appointments, consultations, and access a detailed dashboard. Patients can manage their profile, appointments, view medical history, and leave feedback. This intuitive and functional platform enhances clinic management and user experience for both patients and administrators.

2.DESCRIPTION: The FlyCar project was developed using Angular for the front-end and Spring Boot for the back-end, with Spring Security ensuring data security and Java Mail for email management. The user interface is designed with Angular Material, offering a modern and responsive user experience. This comprehensive application enables management of users, vehicles, bookings, payments, and maps, while ensuring secure registration and login functionalities.

3.DESCRIPTION: The STEG project is a request management platform with four sessions: Administrator, Client, DDI, and DPTE/Guichet. Clients can submit requests and check their status. The administrator assigns requests to appropriate departments (DDI, DPTE, or Guichet), manages associated documents, and prints requests. Developed with Spring, Spring Security, and JWT for authentication, and Angular for the user interface, this system ensures efficient and secure process management, enhancing user experience and internal productivity.

4.DESCRIPTION: My portfolio project, developed with Angular 15, incorporates Bootstrap and PrimeNG frameworks to achieve a responsive and polished user interface. Utilizing Angular's robust capabilities, I've integrated ngx-translate for seamless multilingual support, ensuring a globally accessible experience. Additionally, I've implemented ngx-lightbox to enhance image presentation, providing an interactive showcase of my work. This project exemplifies my proficiency in leveraging modern web technologies to deliver intuitive and visually compelling web solutions.
